name: Dew Earrings
description:
Sparkling drops of green amethyst suspended on a silver thread like falling dew from a twig.

These minimalistic earrings feature segments of silver tube that lead to three flawless aqua amethysts cut in the shape of onions. They hang beautifully from a hand made ear hook and rainbows of light shine through the stones.

Certainly an elegant piece for this holidays.

They hang 2.39 in / 6.2 cm.
The biggest amethyst bead has a diameter of 0.32 in / 8 mm.
The smallest amethyst bead has a diameter of 0.28 in /7 mm.

Important: Ready to ship in April
***Please read carefully my shipping information***

name: Madame Yu Earrings
description:
These earrings are Lirio's interpretation of a Venus. Madame Yu is a modern Venus dressed in her silver sequined dress, with the skin of a pearl and her long hair tied up in a pony tail.

Elegant and eye-catching, these sterling silver earrings will softly titillate reflecting the light on its hammered surface.

The gray cultured pearls have a beautiful iridescent luster.

They hang 1.8 in /4.6 cm.
The silver body is 1.14 in / 3 cm long and 0.3 in. / 8.8 mm wide.
The pearl measures 0.2 x 0.3 in. / 6 x 8 mm.

Important: Ready to ship in April
***Please read carefully my shipping information***

name: Strawberry Earrings
description:
These very light earrings are inspired by the skin of strawberries.
The small perforations let the light shine through and create a game of textures with the rough linear texture of the surface. The burnished edge of the ovals shine playfully as you move your head.

Made of sterling silver with hand made ear-hooks.
The ovals are 4.6 cm / 1.8 in. long and 1.8 cm / 0.7 in. wide and the earrings hang 6 cm / 2.4 in.

Important: Ready to ship in April
***Please read carefully my shipping information***
